containment_policy: Suspension of issuing new visas in China
Suspension of direct flights to and from China
Duty to report gatherings of over 5,000 people
Suspension of direct flights to and from selected regions of Italy
Suspension of direct flights to and from South Korea
Spectators banned from attending the World Biathlon Cup Championship race
Suspension of issuing of new visas in Iran
Random medical checks at major border crossings
All who return from Italy are ordered to contact their general practitioner and self-quarantine for 14 days
All people who were in contact with confirmed COVID-19 patients are  ordered to mandatory 14 day self-quarantine
Gatherings of 100 or more people banned
Anyone crossing borders into the Czech Republic must allow authorities to perform a medical check
Anyone who visited a selected countries over the past 14 days subject to mandatory self-quarantine of 14 days
Ban on visits in hospitals and similar facilities
Army units deployed to support border enforcement
All pupils and students banned from personally attending classes
COVID-19 added to list of diseases the willful spreading of which constitutes a felony
Public banned from entering premises of selected services (including fitness centres, public libraries, and social clubs)
Public banned from entering tourist information centres and swimming pools
All publicly accessible restaurants closed
Gatherings of 30 or more people banned
General closure of services and retail sale
Any road vehicles with a capacity of more than 9 people (incl. driver) banned from crossing borders
Family members banned from visiting relatives in prisons and jails
Public banned from entering sporting venues for 30 or more people, both indoor and outdoor
Public authorities restricted to perform only to necessary duties
Provisional enforcement of borders with Germany and Austria and limitations on international flights
Foreigners coming in from selected countries banned from entering the Czech Republic
"Drive-through" tents set up in front of designated hospitals around the country
Na Homolce Hospital and St. Anna University Hospital designated to deal with COVID-19 only
Soldiers and Customs Service agents being deployed at the border deputised for police duty
Order for persons to limit movement through public places and limit contact with others as much as possible
Quarantine of town of Litovel and 18 nearby municipalities including Uničov and Červenka
Quarantine of municipality of Kynice
Czech residens not allowed to leave the country and foreigners not allowed to enter the country
Ban on movement outside of the home without having mouth and nose covered by a respirator, face mask or similar
Only elderly (65+) can enter establishments at selected times
Gatherings of more than 2 people banned
Municipal and regional assemblies shall convene only for necessary purposes
Several hundred beds were set aside for quarantine and treatment of elderly with mild symptoms
Soldiers deployed to reinforce health authority for the purpose of tracing contacts of COVID-19 positive patients
